data_subwindow module¶

class data_node_editor.data_subwindow.DataSubWindow¶

Bases: node_editor.node_editor_widget.NodeEditorWidget

initNewNodeActions()¶

Instantiates nodes actions.

Those QActions only holds icons, title of the node and op_code which identify which nodes to create.

initNodesContextMenu()¶

Instantiates context menu that popup on right click

addCloseEventListener(callback: Callable)¶

Add callback to the callback list when closing the :classs:~`data_node_editor.data_node_editor.DataSubWindow`.

Parameters

callback (Callable) – function to call when closing :classs:~`data_node_editor.data_node_editor.DataSubWindow`.

Returns

Return type

None

setTitle()¶

Set the title of the subwindow from the current filename.

onHistoryRestored()¶

Triggered when history is restored and eval nodes outputs.

onDragEnter(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QDragEnterEvent)¶

On drag enter. It is typically triggered when dragging a node from the :class:data_node_editor.data_drag_listbox.DragListBox.

onDrop(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QDropEvent)¶

On dropping a node from the :class:data_node_editor.data_drag_listbox.DragListBox.

closeEvent(event)¶

Close event

getMainWindow()¶

Return the main window reference holding the subwindow

getNodeClassFromData(data: dict) → Type[Union[node_editor.node_node.Node, data_node_editor.data_node_base.DataNode]]¶

Returns class definition for the op_code in data.

Parameters

data (dict) – Node or DataNode serialized as dict.

Returns

Return type

Type[Union[Node, DataNode]]

evalOutputs()¶

Compute nodes outputs.

fileLoad(filename: str) → bool¶

Load saved data node editor file

Parameters

filename (str) – path to saved data node editor

Returns

  • bool

  • True if successful else False

contextMenuEvent(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QContextMenuEvent) → None¶

Triggered when right clicking in the subwindow.

On right click on a Node, trigger the node evaluation menu. On right click on an Edge, trigger the edge type menu. On right click on an empty space, trigger the new node context menu

handleNodeContextMenu(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QContextMenuEvent)¶

Triggered when right clicking on a Node. Display a menu to change the node state.

handleEdgeContextMenu(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QContextMenuEvent)¶

Triggered when right clicking on an Edge. Display a menu to define the type of the edge

handleNewNodeContextMenu(event: PyQt5.QtGui.QContextMenuEvent)¶

Triggered when right clicking on an empty space. Display a menu to create new node on the scene.

finish_new_node_state(new_node)¶
print(*args)¶
